wikitext.*:
'''Tumhalad''' was a field in [[West Beleriand]] that lay between the [[Narog|Narog River]] and its tributary, the [[Ginglith]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref> Here the army of [[Nargothrond]], led by [[Túrin]] and [[Orodreth]], fought the '''[[Battle of Tumhalad]]''', a last desperate defence against an onslaught led by the [[Dragons|Dragon]] [[Glaurung]]. The [[Elves]] were overrun and [[Orodreth]], King of Nargothrond, was slain.  Túrin carried the dying [[Gwindor]] from the battle before speeding back to the defence of Nargothrond.<ref>{{S|Turin}}</ref>
